title: (x) Sans from GE website - GE Inspira {Paul H}
content:
Any thoughts on what this sans is?? Many thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714003521im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GE_4082.jpg)

 [‹ Garamond?](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714003521/http:/typophile.com/node/34387 "Go to previous forum topic") [Bayview hand drawn type w/ hairline serifs ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714003521/http:/typophile.com/node/34367 "Go to next forum topic")
author: JB01

comments.content:
Jeff,

If you’re meaning GE as in General Electic, they paid for getting a custom type made especially for them. I don’t know if it was based on some excisting design or made from scratch? But I’m sure there are other typophiles who are able to fill me in on that issue?!

Cheers
in a similar vein as VAG... I luv it!!!

I have to admit it has a very convincing clarity and ’straight-ness’.  
Too bad it’s not available for sale:)
GE Inspira is a [Typophile® Type ID Board Classic™](http://web.archive.org/web/20070714003521/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20ge%20inspira).
